title: Authors and Citation
text: Søyland M (2023). NorSentLex: Norwegian sentiment lexicon positive negative words. R package version 0.1.0, https://martigso.github.io/NorSentLex/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {NorSentLex: Norwegian sentiment lexicon of positive and negative words},   author = {Martin Søyland},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://martigso.github.io/NorSentLex/}, }

what: Norwegian sentiment lexicon of positive and negative words
title: Norwegian sentiment lexicon of positive and negative words
text: repository R-format version Norwegian sentiment lexicons shown Barnes et.al (2019).

title: Norwegian sentiment lexicon of positive and negative words
text: package can installed using install_github() function devtools package R:

title: Norwegian sentiment lexicon of positive and negative words
text: package mirrors structure vanilla NorSentLex repository, typical R type format. two available datasets: nor_fullform_sent nor_lemma_sent. can easily loaded R: data structured follows:

title: Norwegian sentiment lexicon of positive and negative words
text: fullform data contains list one element (“positive”) 6103 positive fullform tokens one element (“negative”) 14839 negative fullform tokens. can extracted name loading data R (see ):

title: Norwegian sentiment lexicon of positive and negative words
text: lemmatized part data contain list element positive negative lexicons following parts--speech: adjective, noun, participle adjective, verb: lexicons can also extracted calling names within list:

title: Norwegian sentiment lexicon of positive and negative words
text: Barnes et al. (2019) Lexicon information neural sentiment analysis: multi-task learning approach. Proceedings 22nd Nordic Conference Computational Linguistics. Turku, Finland ACL Anthology

what: Norwegian negative sentiment dictionary in fullform with part-of-speech — nor_fullform_pos_sent_negative
title: Norwegian negative sentiment dictionary in fullform with part-of-speech — nor_fullform_pos_sent_negative
text: Data containting sentiment dictionaries negative fullform tokens part--speech tags Norwegian, based Sentiment Analysis Norwegian Text project Department Informatics, University Oslo.

title: Norwegian negative sentiment dictionary in fullform with part-of-speech — nor_fullform_pos_sent_negative
code: data(nor_fullform_pos_sent_negative)  head(nor_fullform_pos_sent_negative) #>         token                   pos is_base_form #> 1 forgiftende Participle_Adjectives          yes #> 2 forgiftende Participle_Adjectives           no #> 3     avgrunn                  Noun          yes #> 4  avgrunnene                  Noun           no #> 5     avgrunn                  Noun           no #> 6   avgrunner                  Noun           no

title: Norwegian positive sentiment dictionary in fullform with part-of-speech — nor_fullform_pos_sent_positive
code: data(nor_fullform_pos_sent_positive)  head(nor_fullform_pos_sent_positive) #>         token       pos is_base_form #> 1       humor      Noun          yes #> 2     humoren      Noun           no #> 3       humor      Noun           no #> 4  realistisk Adjective          yes #> 5 realistiske Adjective           no #> 6  realistisk Adjective           no

what: Norwegian sentiment dictionary in fullform — nor_fullform_sent
title: Norwegian sentiment dictionary in fullform — nor_fullform_sent
text: Data containting sentiment dictionaries positive negative fullform words Norwegian, based _Sentiment Analysis Norwegian Text_ project Department Informatics, University Oslo.

title: Norwegian sentiment dictionary in fullform — nor_fullform_sent
Norwegian sentiment dictionary in fullform — nor_fullform_sent
text: object class list containing one character vector positive fullform tokens one character vector negative fullform tokens

title: Norwegian sentiment dictionary in fullform — nor_fullform_sent
text: Barnes et al. (2019) Lexicon information neural sentiment analysis: multi-task learning approach. Proceedings 22nd Nordic Conference Computational Linguistics. Turku, Finland (ACL Anthology)

title: Norwegian sentiment dictionary in fullform — nor_fullform_sent
code: data(nor_fullform_sent)  sent_pos <- nor_fullform_sent$positive sent_neg <- nor_fullform_sent$negative  head(sent_pos) #> [1] "absolutt"    "absolutta"   "absolutte"   "absoluttene" "absolutter"  #> [6] "absoluttet"  head(sent_neg) #> [1] "abnorm"   "abnorme"  "abnormt"  "abort"    "aborten"  "abortene"

what: Norwegian sentiment dictionary in lemmatized form — nor_lemma_sent
title: Norwegian sentiment dictionary in lemmatized form — nor_lemma_sent
text: Data containting sentiment dictionaries positive negative lemma tokens Norwegian, based _Sentiment Analysis Norwegian Text_ project Department Informatics, University Oslo.

title: Norwegian sentiment dictionary in lemmatized form — nor_lemma_sent
Norwegian sentiment dictionary in lemmatized form — nor_lemma_sent
text: object class list containing one character vector positive negative lemma tokens across different types parts--speech

title: Norwegian sentiment dictionary in lemmatized form — nor_lemma_sent
text: Barnes et al. (2019) Lexicon information neural sentiment analysis: multi-task learning approach. Proceedings 22nd Nordic Conference Computational Linguistics. Turku, Finland (ACL Anthology)

title: Norwegian sentiment dictionary in lemmatized form — nor_lemma_sent
code: data(nor_lemma_sent)  sent_pos <- nor_lemma_sent$lemma_noun_positive sent_neg <- nor_lemma_sent$lemma_noun_negative  head(sent_pos) #> [1] "absolutt"    "affinitet"   "akklamasjon" "aktelse"     "aktsomhet"   #> [6] "alvor"       head(sent_neg) #> [1] "abort"         "absurditet"    "advarsel"      "aggresjon"     #> [5] "aggressivitet" "akutt"
